sentences.sentence: You will probably notice an element of quirkiness in his behaviour.
sentences.translation: 你很可能会注意到他行为的古怪之处。

sentences.sentence: I wanted to inject a little humor and quirkiness into the film.
sentences.translation: 我希望他在影片中注入一点幽默和诡诈。

sentences.sentence: You are human, in all of your quirkiness, and I love you still.
sentences.translation: 我知道你是谁，你是人类，虽然你很古怪，我仍一样爱你。
